review: I am the last of my friends to get a gadget allowing me to watch Netflix on something other than my laptop. I bought the Fire TV Stick on Amazon's big anniversary sale day mostly for this purpose. I then proceeded to binge watch everything I could think of for two weeks before my grad classes began again. I have to say that while the TV stick might not be as well designed as the Roku (it takes multiple clicks to get to the screen of most apps), it is easy to use and a good deal. I also like that while apps like Netflix, Hulu, and youtube are all available, you can also navigate the Amazon Prime selection or buy Amazon movies and TV series (I guess you can do that on other interfaces as well).Honestly, I'm not sure what the best streaming stick is, but I will say that this one was inexpensive and works well for what I need. I definitely recommend it.
